job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Financial Services,Information Technology and Services,Information Services
job.description: ltstronggtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtThe RoleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe Data Engineer will use industry standard methodologies to implement data integration processes using cloud andor traditional infrastructure technologies Your role will be to deliver data centric development solutions and data transformation logic for use by our customers Excellent written and verbal communication skills and the ability to understand data modeling concepts are encouraged You will be responsible to work with other Data Engineers and Business Analysts while participating in design sessions during development activitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe Expertise And Skills You BringltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors Degree ltligtltligtDatabase SQL experience preferred ltligtltligtRMDS experience Oracle MS SQL server and others experience preferred ltligtltligtData manipulation languages and frameworks JAVA PYTHON JSON experience a plus ltligtltligtSnowflake DB experience a plus ltligtltligtKnowledge of Cloud platforms AWS Azure a plus ltligtltligtContinuous Deployment Continuous Integration ltligtltligtDeveloping data integration solutions ltligtltligtAbility to work in an Agile team structure ltligtltligtAbility to multitask across multiple projects within different contexts in a fastpaced environment ltligtltligtKnowledge of Data modeling techniques ltligtltligtKnowledge of Data Warehousing methodologies and concepts ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtThe TeamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtFidelitys Enterprise Infrastructure Data Services team is looking for data engineer who wants to deliver transformative IT data services We are a dynamic group of experts looking to use emerging models of data lake technologies to rapidly improve the productivity and experience of Fidelitys analytic and data scientist teams We are working in continuous synergy across multiple IT areas to change the way our IT associates work and deliverltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCertificationsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCompany OverviewltbrgtltbrgtAt Fidelity Investments our customers are at the heart of everything we do As a privately held company with a rich 75year history our mission has remained the same since our founding ltemgtto strengthen the financial wellbeing of our clientsltemgt We help people invest and plan for their future We assist companies and nonprofit organizations in delivering benefits to their employees And we provide institutions and independent advisors with investment and technology solutions to help invest their own clients moneyltbrgtltbrgtJoin UsltbrgtltbrgtAt Fidelity youll find endless opportunities to build a meaningful career that positively impacts peoples lives including yours You can take advantage of flexible benefits that support you through every stage of your career empowering you to thrive at work and at home And you dont need a finance background to succeed at Fidelitywe offer a range of opportunities for learning and growth so you can build the career youve always imagined We welcome associates from different backgrounds and with different perspectives to help us innovate and make a difference for our customers and our communitiesltbrgtltbrgtWe invite you to ltstronggtFind Your Fidelityltstronggt at fidelitycareerscomltbrgtltbrgtFidelity Investments is an equal opportunity employer We believe that the most effective way to attract develop and retain a diverse workforce is to build an enduring culture of inclusion and belongingltbrgtltbrgtFidelity will reasonably accommodate applicants with disabilities who need adjustments to participate in the application or interview process To initiate a request for an accommodation contact the HR Leave of AbsenceAccommodation Team by sending an email to accommodations fmrcom or by calling 8008355099 prompt 2 option 2ltbrgtltbrgt
